issue_title: [Security] Data loss risk from last-writer-wins semantics - no conflict detection
approach: Documentation fix - Added comprehensive docstring to TodoStorage class documenting last-writer-wins semantics and concurrency limitations
summary: Added comprehensive documentation to TodoStorage class warning users about last-writer-wins semantics and potential data loss in multi-process scenarios. Added regression test to verify documentation exists.
risks: This is a documentation-only fix - actual data loss risk still exists in multi-process scenarios
Users must read the documentation to be aware of the limitation
limitations: No actual file locking or conflict detection implemented
For production multi-process use, external locking or database solution still recommended
